column13: Data elements for the IMMZ.D13.Update client record Data Dictionary Activity.
The patient.
Indicates if the client received a dose within 24 hours of birth. Whether a birth dose is counted as part of the primary series will depend on the antigen
column35: IMMZ-D-reqVType-1:Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE19 vaccine type is Hepatitis B-containing vaccines OR Poliovirus-containing vaccines. {(%resource.vaccineType.value != 'DE6' and %resource.vaccineType.value != 'DE14') or $this.exists()}

column13: The type of dose in a series that the client received

Indicates if the client has completed the primary vaccination series of a product/antigen. If the client has not yet completed their primary series, it means they may be expected to receive more doses to complete their vaccination regimen for the respective product/antigen
Indicates if the client has completed the booster series of a product/antigen

column12: Date when primary vaccination series was completed
column13: The date when the client completed the primary vaccination series (per product/antigen)
